channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Application Enablement Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Avaya Aura Application Enablement Services

item.title: CVE-2022-2975|2024-08-03T00:52:59.830Z -- avaya -- avaya%20aura%20application%20enablement%20services
item.description: A vulnerability related to weak permissions was detected in Avaya Aura Application Enablement Services web application, allowing an administrative user to modify accounts leading to execution of arbitrary code as the root user. This issue affects Application Enablement Services versions 8.0.0.0 through 8.1.3.4 and 10.1.0.0 through 10.1.0.1. Versions prior to 8.0.0.0 are end of manufacturing support and were not evaluated.
